txt.en: You have removed many of the acid-phials from the possession of the Nink-hai. The Orcs' acid will not be used against the inhabitants of Faldham.
You have discovered a container filled with a mixture of Orc-acids. Taking these dangerous acids away from the Nink-hai tribe would be wise.
Taking the phials away from the Orcs was a wise decision. The mixture within appears to be highly corrosive... produced as a weapon to be brandished against the Eorlingas.
The defilers of the Nink-hai camp are carrying mixtures of acids to be used against the Rohirrim of Faldham.
Collect phials of Nink-hai acid from Nink-hai defilers
Orc-defilers can be found in the Nink-hai camp south-east of Faldham.\n\nThe acids being carried by the defilers should be removed from the possession of the Nink-hai tribe.
Orc-defilers can be found in the Nink-hai camp south-east of Faldham.\n\nThe acids being carried by the defilers should be removed from the possession of the Nink-hai tribe.
